57707.<voice 00947_00057707><start_lip_sync n0:
Grandfather bread Panini, a writer of children's stories, had a deep love for Melsandy Village and wrote heroic
stories set in the village.

57708.<voice 00977_00057708><start_lip_sync n0:
The fairy tale about the little hero was loved by everyone in the village, and even the third story was published
before his death.

57709.<voice 01047_00057709><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01047_00057709><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>And here are the four hazy tales of

as left to us by my grandfather.<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
